Marky Sparky Toys

The Story

Marky Sparky was born in 1996 in Vista, California and as they say:
It all started with a Spark... Mark that is! Our founding father Mark invented the original "NERF® Bow 'n' Arrow" back in the day, then went on to found Marky Sparky in 1996, bringing to life toys & sporting goods for kids across the country. From the Faux Bow line expanding to greater lengths, to Doinkit Darts®, Blast Pad®, and so many more things to come!


The Mission

When you pick up and play with one of our products, we want you to not want to put it down. Our goal is to create toys and sporting goods that can and will be played with for more than just a week or two. They should be robust enough and compelling enough to keep coming out of the closet whenever called upon.
